name: Mars Ascent
description:
A journey of one astronaut as they try to reunite with their family by climbing up a Mars launching facility; manipulating its magnetic poles to aid them in their ascent. Can the astronaut make it to the launch pad before the rocket lifts off with their family? There is only one way to see...

This cartoonish 3D-Platformer will have you controlling an astronaut, and manipulating the magnetic poles of each level to pull and ride boxes to solve short but sweet puzzles. Can you reach the top?

Have fun!

Check out our website at: https://sites.google.com/hawaii.edu/craft-force/
